Trade/Device Name(s): BioPlex 2200 EBV IgG Panel on the BioPlex 2200 Multi-Analyte Detection System
Analyte(s): Epstein-Barr Virus Viral Capsid Antigen (EBV VCA)
Epstein-Barr Virus Early Antigen diffuse (EBV EA-D)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioPlex 2200 EBV IgG Kit, Calibrators, and Controls for qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to EBV NA-1, VCA, and EA-D in human serum using a multiplex flow immunoassay on the BioPlex 2200 system.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to EBV NA-1, VCA, and EA-D in human serum as an aid in the laboratory diagnosis of infectious mononucleosis (IM), intended for use with the BioPlex 2200 system.
